opendb_id.description: Unique identifier for the document (UUID v4)

color.description: The color of this product (e.g., ['Black', 'Red']). Each color of the product should be included in the array.

quantity.description: Number of fans included in the package (e.g., 3). Important for multi-packs

min_airflow.description: The minimum airflow of the fan in CFM. If it is a constant, just fill in min_airflow and ignore max_airflow

max_airflow.description: The maximum airflow of the fan in CFM. If it is a constant, just fill in min_airflow and ignore max_airflow

min_noise_level.description: The minimum noise level of the fan in dB. If it is a constant, just fill in min_noise_level and ignore max_noise_level

max_noise_level.description: The maximum noise level of the fan in dB. If it is a constant, just fill in min_noise_level and ignore max_noise_level

pwm.description: Whether the fan supports Pulse Width Modulation for speed control

led.description: The type of LED lighting, if any (e.g., 'Addressable RGB', 'RGB', 'None')

connector.description: The type of connector(s) the fan uses (e.g., '4-pin PWM + 3-pin 5V Addressable RGB')

controller.description: If the fan includes a controller, specify the type (e.g., '5V Addressable RGB'). Otherwise, indicate 'None'

static_pressure.description: The static pressure of the fan in mmHâ‚‚O

general_product_information.description: General product information and retailer SKUs
